metadata.title: CVE-2021-42716 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in stb stb_image.h 2.27. The PNM loader incorrectlyinterpreted 16-bit PGM files as 8-bit when converting to RGBA, leading to abuffer overflow when later reinterpreting the result as a 16-bit buffer. Anattacker could potentially have crashed a service using stb_image, or readup to 1024 bytes of non-consecutive heap data without control over the readlocation.

criterions.comment: libstb package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
